bug.author: gonhonoria
bug.summary: ERROR 1: PROJ: proj_create_from_database: cannot build geodeticCRS 4326: SQLite error on SELECT name, ellipsoid_auth_name, ellipsoid_code, prime_meridian_auth_name, prime_meridian_code, area_of_use_auth_name, area_of_use_code, publication_date, deprecated FROM geodetic_datum WHERE auth_name = ? AND code = ?: no such column: publication_date
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
Issue to display geomap Type here a clear and concise description of the bug. Aim for 2-3 sentences. <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
What are the steps we should take to reproduce the bug:
Go to '...' Click on '....' Scroll down to '....'
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
Explain what you expect to happen when you go through the steps above, assuming there were no bugs. <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
Explain the buggy behavior you experience when you go through the steps above. If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. <denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
That is, did this use to work the way you expected in the past? yes / no <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: (get it with $ streamlit version 1.1) Python version: (get it with $ python --version 3.6) Using Conda? PipEnv? PyEnv? Pex? OS version: Browser version:
<denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>
If needed, add any other context about the problem here. For example, did this bug come from <denchmark-link:https://discuss.streamlit.io>https://discuss.streamlit.io</denchmark-link> or another site? Link the original source here!

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/gonhonoria>@gonhonoria</denchmark-link> , is this error related to streamlit? Please update the title and description of your issue and re-open the issue after

Yeah You are right. I finally discovered issue was related to geopandas
Le jeu. 2 avr. 2020 à 20:05, Jonathan Rhone <notifications@github.com> a écrit : <denchmark-link:#>…</denchmark-link>
Hi @gonhonoria <https://github.com/gonhonoria>, is this error related to streamlit?
Please update the title and description of your issue and re-open the issue after
— You are receiving this because you were mentioned. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#1293 (comment)>, or unsubscribe <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AI27MOERVNFR7IU4A5DGFMTRKTVZDANCNFSM4L2JRDKA> .
